title: Rasputin Dreamweaver
text: Rasputin Dreamweaver enters the battlefield with seven dream counters on it.Remove a dream counter from Rasputin: Add  to your mana pool.Remove a dream counter from Rasputin: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Rasputin this turn.At the beginning of your upkeep, if Rasputin started the turn untapped, put a dream counter on it.Rasputin can't have more than seven dream counters on it.
